Interface UserDAOInterface

      int createNewUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, int role)
      Creates a new user and returns the userID

    • Method Detail

      • createNewUser

        int createNewUser(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  int role)
        Creates a new user and returns the userID
        Parameters:
        username - the users username
        password - the users password
        role - the role number
        Returns:
        userID generated or -1 if already exists

      • viewUser

        User viewUser(java.lang.String username)
        returns the user with the associated username
        Parameters:
        username - the users username
        Returns:
        the user or null if no user exists

      • updatePassword

        boolean updatePassword(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
        changes the password of a specific user
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the User to change
        password - the new password
        Returns:
        if the password was changed successfully
